structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Application of provisions of KRS 81A.050 to 81A.070 and KRS 81A.400 to 81A.470.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 81A.050 to 81A.070 and KRS 81A.400 to 81A.470 shall apply in any annexation proceeding in which the annexing city has not adopted a final annexation ordinance by July 15, 1980.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980.
